name: Krusty's Super Fun House
description:
Krusty the Clown's Fun House has been overrun by rats. You must help him to herd the rats into trap machines to clear them out. In order to do so, Krusty must manipulate his environment to set up pathways so that the rats are headed in the right direction. Objects that Krusty move around include blocks, fans, and pipe pieces.

The trap machines are operated by other recognizable Simpsons characters: Bart, Homer, Sideshow Mel, and Corporal Punishment.
alsoFor: DOS, Game Boy, Game Gear, Genesis, NES, SEGA Master System, SNES | Combined View

shot.caption: Krusty starts in a hall. There are five sub-halls and in each there are several rooms with rats.
First room of the first sub-hall. Quite easy - just find a block and make rats to leave the pit...
There are also blocks that can be destroyed either by standing on them or shooting with a purple ball.
In one of the sub-halls there are rooms with flying pigs.
There are also springs that help Krusty to reach higher platforms.
The last sub-hall takes place outside.
